title: I've now been perm banned on 9 separate accounts. Riot/players need to nut up, or stop playing.
body:
If you can't handle being flamed because you and the support combine to go 1/33, the internet isn't the place for you .

Riot, if you're going to have a video game, and can't BARE to see any sort of negativity in it, you're in the wrong business.

If you report someone for "Toxic" - get out of 4th grade, use the mute button. Period, "leveling" accounts time and time again is getting old and obnoxious.

It's simple, don't be a pussy.

and if you are going to be a pussy, get off the internet and go to your fucking counselor.

You're on the wrong end of the rules.

Sounds like if you can't handle getting banned, you should probably act with some civility.
If you can't grasp basic civility and can't keep you mind to yourself for half an hour, this game isn't for you.
